title: Deals: LG Wing 5G refurb smartphone hits $280, Google Nest Wifi system $219, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a refurbished LG Wing Android Smartphone discount at $280. That’s alongside an $80 Google Nest Wifi system price cut and new all-time lows on Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 LTE smartwatches. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…

The post Deals: LG Wing 5G refurb smartphone hits $280, Google Nest Wifi system $219, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: LG Wing discount lands in a 1-day Woot refurbished sale at $280 alongside a Google Wifi mesh system price cut to $219 and more.
